sections.heading: to 3-55-3 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1983, ch. 50, § 4, repealed 3-55-1 to 3-55-3 NMSA 1978, relating to inventory of unclaimed property, authority to sell unclaimed property and notice of sale, and proceeds of sale of unclaimed property and vesting of title to property in the purchaser, respectively, effective March 19, 1983. For present provisions,see29-1-13 to 29-1-15 NMSA 1978.
